item.description:
Weekend mornings worked out great last year, so its time to get them started again. These take place in Foote Park in Branford, where there are 4 hardcourts and 8 clay courts. As always, all levels are welcome. I look forward to seeing the group veterans again and meeting new members, and being forced to get in shape as you kick my ass all over the court!

Additionally, I just received information on Pilot Pen for this year. FYI, I would like to have a group go to the event for at least one of the sessions.

And, if you live in Branford, follow Branford politics at BranfordSeven.com. Yup, I write it.

Steve

group.name: Tennis Meetup of New Haven and Fairfield Counties

item.name: Saturday Morning Tennis
